snippet: ​ The risk to the public is low, the C.D.C. said Monday, although the patient, who traveled from India in April, has been hospitalized in Maryland with a drug-resistant form of the disease.
abstract: Woman is diagnosed with XDR-TB, drug-resistant strain of tuberculosis, after traveling to India; Centers for Disease Control and Prevention seek to identify people who may have come into contact with her in weeks between her return to country and hospitalization.
lead_paragraph: ​ The risk to the public is low, the C.D.C. said Monday, although the patient, who traveled from India in April, has been hospitalized in Maryland with a drug-resistant form of the disease.

headline.main: Tuberculosis Case Prompts Search for Patient’s Fellow Airline Passengers
headline.print_headline: Officials Trace Path of Passenger With TB

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
